subject: Did not receive baseplate
description_text:
Hello,

As the subject line says I received my pedals but did not receive the baseplate that was supposed to be apart of my order. Below is the information from Amazon for my order:
Order Placed: June 21, 2025
Amazon.com order number: 111-7916989-8035414
Order Total: $310.68

Thanks
Anthony Camacho
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Camacho,  Hi, I am sorry for the inconvenience caused. We have reshipped a new plate for you from US warehouse, here is your tracking number: 1ZH912Y00320139464, the shipping carrier is UPS.

Great thank you!

Anthony
Sent from my iPhone

>
